pull.title: build: Ensure source tarball has leading directory name (0.20)
pull.body: In the interest of moving 0.20.0 forward and being able to do rc2, extract and backport the non-controversial part from #18818.: ensure that the source tarball has leading directory name.

repo.name: bitcoin
repo.description: Laanwj's Bitcoin Core fork - see README.md on "readme" branch

events.message: build: Ensure source tarball has leading directory name

rename.from: build: Ensure source tarball has leading directory name
rename.to: build: Ensure source tarball has leading directory name (0.20)

events.body:
I think DrahtBot can't build non-master branches, sorry :sweat_smile: 

Maybe @jonasschnelli's build farm can do?

ACK 59d57f6c103100b3fdef59298d57ee8cf4c0b181.

FWIW, #18909 is also in progress.

> I think DrahtBot can't build non-master branches, sorry sweat_smile

I'll try to run my own gitian build.

> FWIW, #18909 is also in progress.

Yes, thank you.
The reason to open this is that it's a) trivial b) everyone wants this c) I don't particularly want to hold up 0.20.0 on people agreeing whether to include the automake cruft or not.

Gitian output:
```
68a0a4f4728f23985ef937e38622e847fa9f1cae9e25ca8cf75a57cb7d908ffe  src/bitcoin-0.20.0rc1.tar.gz
```

```
$ tar -tvf build/out/src/bitcoin-0.20.0rc1.tar.gz |less
drwxrwxr-x root/root         0 2020-05-11 15:09 bitcoin-0.20.0rc1/
-rw-rw-r-- root/root      4692 2020-05-11 15:09 bitcoin-0.20.0rc1/.appveyor.yml
â€¦
```

tACK 59d57f6c103100b3fdef59298d57ee8cf4c0b181

```
68a0a4f4728f23985ef937e38622e847fa9f1cae9e25ca8cf75a57cb7d908ffe  src/bitcoin-0.20.0rc1.tar.gz
```

This extracts to `bitcoin-0.20.0rc1` dir, presumably because it's based on the 0.20 branch?

Yes, this is a fix for 0.20.0, it's supposed to do that.

We should do a similar thing on master, but the gitian descriptors have been reorganized there (so the solution needs to be slightly different) and there's not as much hurry.

issue.title: [0.20] Final backports for rc2
issue.body:
Backports the following PRs to the 0.20 branch:

* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18578: gui: Fix leak in CoinControlDialog::updateView
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18808: [net processing] Drop unknown types in getdata
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18814: rpc: Relock wallet only if most recent callback
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18878: test: Add test for conflicted wallet tx notifications
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18894: gui: Fix manual coin control with multiple wallets loaded
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18742: miner: Avoid stack-use-after-return in validationinterface
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18962: net processing: Only send a getheaders for one block in an INV
* https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/18975: test: Remove const to work around compiler error on xenial

issue.title: build: Ensure source tarball has leading directory name
issue.body:
This has been fixed in 0.20, so it needs to be fixed on master as well to avoid a regression

#18945
